altername_name: Shinseiki Evangelion: Koutetsu no Girlfriend Tokubetsu-Hen Portable
name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel
overview: A shy female character, Mana Kirishima, starts at Shinji Ikari's school and immediately admits to finding him cute. Gradually, a relationship unfolds and they end up going on a date. It turns out, however, that she is one of three test pilots for the TRIDENT units, a new competitor to the Evangelions, similar to Jet Alone; thus the name Girlfriend of Steel.
